page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar hidedisclosure method

argument.name: animation
argument.description: Whether or not to animate the hiding of the disclosure. The default value is true.

discussion.p: If animation is set to true then the disclosure will animate out with the reverse of the animation used to show it.

page.example: // assume cbObj is a pointer to an instance of A5.ControlBar cbObj.hideDisclosure();
